name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_10000_FUNDS_EMBEZZLED
description: Embezzle 10000 in funds.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_PSYCHOPATH
description: Win the game having declared war on every faction the turn you encountered them, as well as never negotiating a peace treaty.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_KILL_10000_MEN_IN_BATTLE
description: Kill 10,000 enemy in battles

name: ACHIEVEMENT_KILL_100000_MEN_IN_BATTLE
description: Kill 100,000 enemy in battles

name: ACHIEVEMENT_KILL_1000000_MEN_IN_BATTLE
description: Kill 1,000,000 enemy in battles

name: ACHIEVEMENT_COMPLETE_AN_ENTIRE_CAMPAIGN_WINNING_EVERY_BATTLE_WITHOUT_AUTORESOLVE
description: Complete an entire campaign, by playing and winning every battle

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_ATTILA_THE_HUN_BORN
description: Ensure your faction survives until Attila the Hun is born.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_FAMILY_MEMBER_ASSIGNED_TO_POST
description: Arrange a promotion for a member of your family.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_FOUGHT_BATTLE_KILLED_EVERYONE_AND_KILLED_CAPTIVES
description: Destroy an entire enemy army, killing everyone and taking no prisoners.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_RESEARCHED_EVERY_TECH_AS_WESTERN_ROMAN_EMPIRE
description: Research all technologies available to the Western Roman Empire.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_ARRANGE_20_MARRIAGES
description: Arrange 20 Marriages

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_MAX_LEVEL_AGENTS_OF_ALL_TYPES
description: Ensure 1 of each agent type (priest, spy and veteran) attains the highest level at the same time.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_WIN_CAMPAIGN_FIELDING_AN_ARMY_THAT_EXISTED_FROM_START_WITHOUT_REINSTATEMENT_UNDEFEATED
description: Complete the Grand Campaign whilst fielding an army or fleet undefeated since the start.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_SACK_10_SETTLEMENTS_AS_THE_HUNS
description: Sack 10 Settlements as The Huns.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_AS_VANDALS_SACK_ROME
description: As the Vandals, sack the city of Roma.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_BATTLE_WON_10_TO_1_BALANCE_OF_POWER
description: Win a campaign battle in which you are outnumbered 10-to-1.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_CHANGED_STATE_RELIGION_OTHER
description: Change your faction's state religion to minor religions.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_AS_HUNS_RECEIVE_2000_STATE_GIFT_FROM_ROMANS
description: As the Huns, obtain a state gift of 2,000 from the Romans.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_50_PERCENT_RELIGION_ADOPTION_AFTER_STATE_RELIGION_CHANGE
description: Change your state religion and convert 50% of your empire's population to it.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_THREE_SUCCESSIVE_GENERATIONS_OF_LEVEL_5_OR_ABOVE_CHARACTERS
description: Ensure that 3 successive generations of characters from the same family reach level 5.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_KILL_ATTILA
description: Kill Attila the Hun by any means at your disposal.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_USE_PREACH_INTOLERANCE_3_TIMES
description: Use a priest's Preach Intolerance ability on a settlement 3 times.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_USE_SABOTAGE_WALLS_3_TIMES
description: Use a veteran's Sabotage ability on a settlement 3 times.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_USE_POISON_STORES_3_TIMES
description: Use a spy's Poison Stores ability on a settlement 3 times.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_SUCCESSFUL_BOARDING
description: Successfully board a ship during a naval battle.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_RAMMING_KILL
description: Destroy an enemy ship by ramming it.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_WIN_NIGHT_BATTLE
description: Fight and win a battle at night.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_HAMMER_AND_ANVIL
description: Attack an enemy unit in the rear whilst it is already engaged with another.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_WIN_1_CAMPAIGN_LAND_BATTLE
description: Fight and win a single campaign land battle.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_WIN_1_CAMPAIGN_NAVAL_BATTLE
description: Play and win 1 campaign naval battle

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_WIN_1_CAMPAIGN_SIEGE_BATTLE
description: Play and win 1 campaign siege battle

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_WIN_1_MULTIPLAYER_QUICK_BATTLE
description: Play and win 1 multiplayer Quick Battle

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_KILL_10_SHIPS
description: Sink 10 enemy ships during naval battles.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_WIN_FOGGY_BATTLE
description: Fight and win a battle in foggy conditions.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_WIN_SIEGE_WITHOUT_DAMAGING_SETTLEMENT
description: Fight and win a siege battle without damaging the settlement in any way.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_RECOVER_FROM_WAVERING_3_TIMES
description: Your infantry unit recovers from wavering 3 times during a single campaign battle.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_KILL_SHIP_WITH_GREEK_FIRE

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_MIXED_BATTLE_MARINE_KILL_LAND_UNIT

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_3_RALLIES_PER_BATTLE

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_ENGAGE_UNIT_WITH_FORMATION

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_WIN_AGAINST_20_UNITS_STACK_WITH_GARRISON

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_WIN_AND_BURN_SETTLEMENT

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_WIN_CUSTOM_BATTLE_WITH_FORCE_COSTING_HALF_THAN_ENEMY

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATT_WIN_SIEGE_AGAINST_20_UNITS_WITHOUT_BEING_INSIDE_WALL
